title: Polytechnic Engineer
summary: Polytechnic engineer with excellence training at École Polytechnique, globally recognized for training leaders in science and engineering. Passionate about artificial intelligence, robotics, and intelligent systems, with diverse experience ranging from machine learning research to concrete projects in computer vision and video game development. With proven methodological rigor and creativity, I design innovative solutions adapted to complex technological challenges.

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: Development of an AI accelerator based on optical properties. Creation of compelling demonstrations highlighting ultra-fast matrix calculations and concrete AI applications.

experience.title: R&D and Vision Intern
experience.description: Development of advanced computer vision algorithms designed to automate industrial processes. Management of complex projects including real-time detection and tracking of objects in varied environments.

experience.title: RL for Robotics Intern
experience.description: Optimization of robotic exoskeleton control through reinforcement learning. Contribution to applied research with successful implementation of sim-to-real transfers on GPU architectures.

experience.title: Game Development Intern
experience.description: Creation of an educational game for dyslexic children. Integration of machine learning algorithms to adjust level difficulty in real-time and enhance user experience.

experience.title: Mathematics Tutor
experience.description: Coaching and mentoring students in advanced mathematics, with a focus on pedagogy and preparation for entrance exams to prestigious engineering schools.

highlights: One of the most prestigious institutions worldwide
Intensive program combining mathematics, physics, and computer science
Participation in robotics and video game development projects
Focus on computer vision and emotional perception in virtual reality
Elite scientific training in mathematics and physics
Preparation for prestigious engineering schools' entrance exams
First year of scientific preparatory classes
Development of a solid foundation in mathematics, physics, and engineering sciences
Intensive study of French for successful academic and professional integration

projects.name: AI Accelerator
projects.description: Development of an AI accelerator based on optical properties with ultra-fast matrix calculations.

projects.name: Educational Game for Dyslexic Children
projects.description: Game with adaptive difficulty using machine learning algorithms to help dyslexic children.

certifications.name: 3 Silver Medals at Syrian Scientific Olympiads
